DataElement.origin: OMOP CDM:The Observational Medical Outcomes Partnership (OMOP) Common Data Model
DataElement.changeDescription: Based on CDMH BRIDG 5.0.2 and OMOP value set for CDM. Add OMOP Classifications 04-13-2020 DW 2023-08-28 This CDE is mapped to OMOP columns that are narrower, preceding_visit_occurrence_id. This needs to be fixed in CDMH III Code Map project, but for now the column name was fixed to match OMOP, it was missing the last part of the term "_id". -DW
